thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Dairy Crest Says ‍Outlook For Full Year Remains In Line With Expectations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dairy Crest Says ‍Outlook For Full Year Remains In Line With Expectations
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Dairy Crest Group Plc:
* ‍OUTLOOK FOR FULL YEAR REMAINS IN LINE WITH OUR EXPECTATIONS.​
* ‍TOTAL REVENUE FOR GROUP WAS WELL AHEAD OF LAST YEAR FOR NINE MONTH PERIOD​
* ‍KEY BRANDS DELIVERED REVENUE GROWTH OF 7% FOR FIRST NINE MONTHS OF YEAR.​
* ‍CREAM PRICE HAS FALLEN IN RECENT MONTHS AND COUNTRY LIFE PROMOTIONAL ACTIVITY WILL PICK UP IN 2018​
* ‍CATHEDRAL CITY HAS DELIVERED ANOTHER GOOD QUARTER​ * FOR NINE MONTHS ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017 COUNTRY LIFE VOLUMES CONTINUED TO COME UNDER PRESSURE FROM CONSIDERABLE INCREASE IN COST OF CREAM OVER LAST YEAR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
